description: Visualize how Binary Search works. Title: 'What is Binary Search?'. Show 8 sorted boxes labeled 1-8 in a row at y=0.5. Search for 6. Step 1: Check middle (4), show '6 > 4', gray out left boxes 1-4. Step 2: Check middle of right half (6), found it - turn green! Show text 'Found in 2 steps!' at bottom. Keep title at TOP CENTER (not corner). All arrows and labels must stay below y=2.0. Final: 'Binary Search = O(log n)' in yellow centered.
youtube_title: IT`S VERIFIED!!! | Tidal Wave [NEW TOP 1] - in Perfect Quality (4K, 60fps) - Geometry Dash
title: Tidal Wave Verified: The New Top 1
